description: Validation rules for BLEUHeritage Bee Genetics metadata

privacy_rules: Exact coordinates must not appear in public metadata
Site descriptions must be generalized to region level for public data
Landowner/consent information must be kept internal

compliance_notes.gdpr: Personal data must be handled according to data minimization principles
compliance_notes.nagoya: Prior informed consent required for genetic resources
compliance_notes.indigenous_data_sovereignty: CARE principles apply for indigenous knowledge
